verses.roman:
saba lañā prabhu kailā prasāda bhojana
sabāre vidāya dilā karite śayana

synonyms: saba lañā—with all of them; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā—performed; prasāda bhojana—taking prasāda; sabāre—to everyone; vidāya dilā—bade farewell; karite śayana—to take rest.
translation: Then Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took prasāda with all of them and then asked them to return to their dwellings and take rest.
